page.title: 14EMPLOYMENT IN WEST KILBRIDE
page.content: In{West Kilbride}there are{2332 males and{2568 females}which comes to a total of 4900 people.7% of these are under 5 years, 17% are 5-15 years and 20% are OAP's. Number of males in the working age groups is 1730 where only 1311 are economically active. The number of females in working age groups are 2012 and only 626 work in West Kilbride. Most people who live in the village work elsewhere because there are not enough jobs going around for everyone so{many people are {unemployed.}Almost all jobs are in the shops. There are{72 shops}and there is also the school where over twenty teachers are employed. Some{odd jobs are also available in the town.There are also all the{farms}where some teenagers work, some in the farm and some in the fields where they pick potatoes.
